Project W/a/ifu

About

Project Waifu is a project dedicated to bring our beloved waifus to life.

The project consists of two parts. The website part aims to create a catalog where users will be able to upload and download asset files that define different waifus. The client/AI part aims to create a client can can load assets and simulate your waifu.

If you are looking for a waifu

We do not have anything working for you just yet. Check back soon! =)

If you want to contribute

See Contributing above.
